dc_title_s: New [Alpochester?] :is situated on the south bend of the Kalamazoo River at the mouth of Pine Creek.
dc_description_s: 1 map ; 38 x 53 cm.|Photocopy.|Possibly shows the village of New Rochester (aka Sherwood's Mills), previously located near Otsego, Michigan.|North oriented to upper right.|Shows lands and properties.|On verso: From original manuscript on cowhide [deerskin] - courtesy Mich. Hist. Coll. which borrowed the map from private owner 3/20/42.
